languages.text: {n}Едва сдерживая кипящую ярость, Абеляр громыхает:{/n} "{name} фон Валанциус, держатель{mf||ница} священного Патента, помазанни{mf|к|ца} Бога-Императора и влады{mf|ка|чица} сего протектората, отрицает ложные обвинения. Эта вопиющая попытка замарать {mf|его|ее} доброе имя и учинить разбойную расправу не сойдет с рук Администратуму и Адептус Арбитес, будьте уверены!"

{n}Barely containing his seething rage, Abelard thunders,{/n} "{name} von Valancius, bearer of the sacred Warrant, the God-Emperor's anointed and sovereign of this protectorate, denies these false accusations. The Administratum and Adeptus Arbites will not get away with this flagrant attempt to sully the Rogue Trader's good name and plunder {mf|his|her} dynasty's coffers, make no mistake!"
languages.original_text: {n}Едва сдерживая кипящую ярость, Абеляр громыхает:{/n} "{name} фон Валанциус, держатель{mf||ница} священного Патента, помазанни{mf|к|ца} Бога-Императора и влады{mf|ка|чица} сего протектората, отрицает ложные обвинения. Эта вопиющая попытка замарать {mf|его|ее} доброе имя и учинить разбойную расправу не сойдет с рук Администратуму и Адептус Арбитес, будьте уверены!"

The Administratum and Adeptus Arbites will not get away with this flagrant attempt to sully the Rogue Trader's good name and plunder {mf|his|her} dynasty's coffers, make no mistake!"

The Administratum and Adeptus Arbites will not get away with this flagrant attempt to sully the Rogue Trader's good name and plunder {mf|his|her} dynasty's coffers, make no mistake!"

The Administratum and Adeptus Arbites will not get away with this flagrant attempt to sully the Rogue Trader's good name and plunder {mf|his|her} dynasty's coffers, make no mistake!"

{n}Barely containing his seething rage, Abelard thunders,{/n} "{name} von Valancius, bearer of the sacred Warrant, the God-Emperor's anointed and sovereign of this protectorate, denies these false accusations. The Administratum and Adeptus Arbites will not get away with this flagrant attempt to sully the Rogue Trader's good name and plunder {mf|his|her} dynasty's coffers, make no mistake!"

languages.text: {n}Abelard, der seinen Zorn kaum zügeln kann, verkündet mit dröhnender Stimme:{/n} "{name} von Valancius, {mf|Träger|Trägerin} des Handelsbriefs, {mf|Gesalbter|Gesalbte} des Gottimperators und {mf|Herrscher|Herrscherin} dieses Protektorats, bestreitet diese falschen Anschuldigungen. Das Administratum und das Adeptus Arbites wird mit diesem offenkundigen Versuch, den guten Namen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu beflecken und die Schatullen {mf|seiner|ihrer} Dynastie zu plündern, nicht davonkommen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Barely containing his seething rage, Abelard thunders,{/n} "{name} von Valancius, bearer of the sacred Warrant, the God-Emperor's anointed and sovereign of this protectorate, denies these false accusations. The Administratum and Adeptus Arbites will not get away with this flagrant attempt to sully the Rogue Trader's good name and plunder {mf|his|her} dynasty's coffers, make no mistake!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, der seinen Zorn kaum zügeln kann, verkündet mit dröhnender Stimme:{/n} "{name} von Valancius, {mf|Träger|Trägerin} des Handelsbriefs, {mf|Gesalbter|Gesalbte} des Gottimperators und {mf|Herrscher|Herrscherin} dieses Protektorats, bestreitet diese falschen Anschuldigungen. Das Administratum und das Adeptus Arbites wird mit diesem offenkundigen Versuch, den guten Namen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu beflecken und die Schatullen {mf|seiner|ihrer} Dynastie zu plündern, nicht davonkommen!"

languages.text: {n}Peinant à contenir sa rage bouillonnante, Abélard tonne :{/n} « {name} von Valancius, {mf|porteur|porteuse} de la lettre de marque sacrée, {mf|consacré|consacrée} par l'Empereur-Dieu et {mf|souverain|souveraine} de ce protectorat, rejette ces fausses accusations. Ne croyez pas que l'Administratum et l'Adeptus Arbites s'en tireront à bon compte après avoir ainsi tenté de ternir la réputation {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et de piller les coffres de sa dynastie ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Barely containing his seething rage, Abelard thunders,{/n} "{name} von Valancius, bearer of the sacred Warrant, the God-Emperor's anointed and sovereign of this protectorate, denies these false accusations. The Administratum and Adeptus Arbites will not get away with this flagrant attempt to sully the Rogue Trader's good name and plunder {mf|his|her} dynasty's coffers, make no mistake!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Peinant à contenir sa rage bouillonnante, Abélard tonne :{/n} « {name} von Valancius, {mf|porteur|porteuse} de la lettre de marque sacrée, {mf|consacré|consacrée} par l'Empereur-Dieu et {mf|souverain|souveraine} de ce protectorat, rejette ces fausses accusations. Ne croyez pas que l'Administratum et l'Adeptus Arbites s'en tireront à bon compte après avoir ainsi tenté de ternir la réputation {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et de piller les coffres de sa dynastie ! »

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德几乎已经无法克制住沸腾的怒火，厉声怒斥。{/n}“{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，神圣授状的持有者，神皇的神选者，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝领袖，否认上述所有不实指控。内政部与法务部企图玷污行商浪人的光辉名望，公然掠夺王朝国库！如此厚颜无耻的行为，所有涉事官员都别想逃脱惩罚！都给我听清楚了！”
languages.original_text: {n}Barely containing his seething rage, Abelard thunders,{/n} "{name} von Valancius, bearer of the sacred Warrant, the God-Emperor's anointed and sovereign of this protectorate, denies these false accusations. The Administratum and Adeptus Arbites will not get away with this flagrant attempt to sully the Rogue Trader's good name and plunder {mf|his|her} dynasty's coffers, make no mistake!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德几乎已经无法克制住沸腾的怒火，厉声怒斥。{/n}“{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，神圣授状的持有者，神皇的神选者，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝领袖，否认上述所有不实指控。内政部与法务部企图玷污行商浪人的光辉名望，公然掠夺王朝国库！如此厚颜无耻的行为，所有涉事官员都别想逃脱惩罚！都给我听清楚了！”

languages.text: {n}Apenas capaz de contener su ira ardiente, Abelard ruge:{/n} «{name} von Valancius, portador{mf||a} de la sagrada Patente, ungid{mf|o|a} del Dios Emperador y soberan{mf|o|a} de este protectorado, niega estas falsas acusaciones. ¡El Administratum y el Adeptus Arbites no saldrán impunes de este descarado intento de mancillar el buen nombre de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y saquear las arcas de su dinastía, no lo duden!».
languages.original_text: {n}Barely containing his seething rage, Abelard thunders,{/n} "{name} von Valancius, bearer of the sacred Warrant, the God-Emperor's anointed and sovereign of this protectorate, denies these false accusations. The Administratum and Adeptus Arbites will not get away with this flagrant attempt to sully the Rogue Trader's good name and plunder {mf|his|her} dynasty's coffers, make no mistake!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Apenas capaz de contener su ira ardiente, Abelard ruge:{/n} «{name} von Valancius, portador{mf||a} de la sagrada Patente, ungid{mf|o|a} del Dios Emperador y soberan{mf|o|a} de este protectorado, niega estas falsas acusaciones. ¡El Administratum y el Adeptus Arbites no saldrán impunes de este descarado intento de mancillar el buen nombre de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y saquear las arcas de su dinastía, no lo duden!».

languages.text: {n}怒りを必死に抑えながら、アベラルドは怒鳴った。{/n}「聖なる令状の所有者であり、神帝陛下に聖別されしこの保護領の統治者、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは、これらの虚偽の告発を否定します。帝国行政局と高等裁定局が、ローグトレーダーの名誉を汚し、ヴァランシウス王朝の財宝を略奪しようとするこの露骨な企てを許すと思わないでください！」
languages.original_text: {n}Barely containing his seething rage, Abelard thunders,{/n} "{name} von Valancius, bearer of the sacred Warrant, the God-Emperor's anointed and sovereign of this protectorate, denies these false accusations. The Administratum and Adeptus Arbites will not get away with this flagrant attempt to sully the Rogue Trader's good name and plunder {mf|his|her} dynasty's coffers, make no mistake!"

traits.locale_text: {n}怒りを必死に抑えながら、アベラルドは怒鳴った。{/n}「聖なる令状の所有者であり、神帝陛下に聖別されしこの保護領の統治者、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは、これらの虚偽の告発を否定します。帝国行政局と高等裁定局が、ローグトレーダーの名誉を汚し、ヴァランシウス王朝の財宝を略奪しようとするこの露骨な企てを許すと思わないでください！」

languages.text: {n}Hiddetini güçlükle dizginleyen Abelard, âdeta kükrüyor.{/n} "Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin Hamili, Tanrı İmparator'un Kutsanmışı ve bu protektoranın hükümdarı {name} von Valancius, bu iftiraları reddetmektedir. Hür Tacir'in saygıdeğer ismini alenen karalama ve hanedanlığının hazinelerini yağmalama girişimi, ne Administratum'un ne de Adeptus Arbites'in yanına kâr kalacaktır. Görürsünüz siz!"
languages.original_text: {n}Barely containing his seething rage, Abelard thunders,{/n} "{name} von Valancius, bearer of the sacred Warrant, the God-Emperor's anointed and sovereign of this protectorate, denies these false accusations. The Administratum and Adeptus Arbites will not get away with this flagrant attempt to sully the Rogue Trader's good name and plunder {mf|his|her} dynasty's coffers, make no mistake!"

Hür Tacir'in saygıdeğer ismini alenen karalama ve hanedanlığının hazinelerini yağmalama girişimi, ne Administratum'un ne de Adeptus Arbites'in yanına kâr kalacaktır. Görürsünüz siz!"
